content.question: Gel electrophoresis can be used to directly determine which of the following?

choices.label: The amino acid sequence of a protein
The number of base pairs in a fragment of <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>DNA</mi></math>
The organelle in a cell toward which a protein moves after its initial synthesis
Whether one allele of a gene is more subject to genetic drift than are other alleles of the same gene

content.answer: The number of base pairs in a fragment of <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>DNA</mi></math>
